node.title: Police seek dashcam footage to help Lower Hutt serious assault investigation
node.description: Two people were hospitalised following the "unprovoked and cowardly attack".
node.content: ["Wellington Police are urging the public to send them dashcam footage to help an assault investigation.", "Two people were seriously assaulted at Trevethick Grove, Lower Hutt at around 2:15am on Saturday.", "\"We are now asking for any members of the public who were in their vehicles in the vicinity of Trevethick Grove, Whites Line West and Ludlam Crescent at around 2:15am and have dashcam footage to contact police,\" they say.", "The 18-year-old man who received life-threatening injuries is in a stable condition in the Wellington Hospital intensive care unit.", "The other victim, a 19-year-old-man, remains in Hutt Hospital.", "Police say it was an \"unprovoked and cowardly attack by multiple offenders\".", "\"Staff are continuing to speak to members of the public who live in the vicinity of Trevethick Grove as well as people who attended a party at a Trevethick Grove address prior to the assault,\" they say.", "\"Anyone who is yet to make contact with Police is asked to come forward.\"", "Residents in the area are also asked to check their properties for any items that do not belong to them and that may have been involved in the attack.", "Anyone with information or footage that could help police is asked to call the investigation team on 105 quoting 211218/4047.", "Information can also be passed on anonymously by contacting Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111."]
